# Badshah's Kitchen - Café Ordering App

## Project Overview
Mobile-first café ordering app built with Next.js 15, App Router, and Tailwind CSS.
No authentication required - simple and clean ordering experience.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- TypeScript for type safety
- Mobile-first responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Keep components simple and focused
- Use App Router conventions (app directory)
- Mobile-first approach for all UI components
- Clean, minimalist design aesthetic
